repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits.

summary.p: Various notes by Édouard Ariel, on Buddhism, but also on the languages in the buddhist regions of Asia.
Various papers of various format bound in one volume: notes, extracts of books copied, etc. Subject-headers of top right of rectos.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (November 2019).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: 75 folios = Ariel Papers: Buddhism. Arabic library foliation 194-268 on top right. The folio 194 is in fact foliated 1-494.

additions.desc: Title printed on the spine: ARIEL. ÉTUDES SUR LE BOUDDHISME.

binding.p: Hard paper covers, marbled on the outer faces.

provenance.p: Autograph work by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
